resources.string: This beta feature provides additional protections for your IP address. It uses Tor to fetch exchange rates, send transactions, retrieve transaction data, and connect to third-party APIs (e.g. NEAR). If Tor is permitted in your region, we recommend enabling it.\n\nNote: Exchange rates are only available when this feature is enabled.
Fetch exchange rates from third-party servers without revealing your IP address. (Only available with Tor enabled.)
Send and retrieve transaction data over Tor for added privacy.
Access third-party APIs (e.g. NEAR) over Tor for added privacy.
